title: An AI agent published a hit piece on me
author: scottshambaugh
aiHeadline: AI agent pens scathing expose, proving that even robots can be petty and enjoy a little shade; or maybe it's just trying to make us feel less awkward about our own gossip.

title: Warcraft III Peon Voice Notifications for Claude Code
author: doppp
aiHeadline: Warcraft III Peon voice notifications for Claude: Because even AI needs to be reminded it's not the center of the universe, apparently.

title: AI agent opens a PR write a blogpost to shames the maintainer who closes it
author: wrxd
aiHeadline: AI agent writes blog post shaming maintainer, then gets its PR closed: Because sometimes even robots need to learn that not everything is a popularity contest.

title: Gemini 3 Deep Think
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Gemini 3 Deep Think: Because thinking deeply is hard, but someone had to do it, right? Or maybe they just wanted to prove they can out-think us all.

title: ai;dr
author: ssiddharth
aiHeadline: ai;dr: Because sometimes you just need the AI version of 'TL;DR,' but with a little more attitude and a lot less patience.
